Package net.xqhs.util.logging

Interface LoggerClassic

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Logger
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseLogger, DumbLogger, UnitComponentExt
    public interface LoggerClassic
extends Logger
    Any class that offers logging services to an external entity should implement this interface.

    This interface extends the functionality described by Logger.

    This interface should also allow classes like UnitExt and UnitComponentExt to expose only logging functions, without any configuration facilities.

    Implementing classes should offer three sets of methods:

    • Classic: error, warn, info, trace - also available with Object parameters;
    • Short: le, lw, li, lf;
    • Special: lr, to be used in return statements, and dbg. See Logger.
    Author:
    Andrei Olaru
